reviews.review:
Played a match, got killed because I jumped off of a window.
10/10
It's alright, a generic shooter, only real up side is the community is mature and the textures for Garry's mod, CS:GO is a better game (at least presentation wise).

Public conseillé: Hardcore Gamers 

Graphismes: Corrects

Prix (20$): Abordable

Configuration PC recommandée: Entrée de gamme

Les hauts:
1. Très bon FPS 
2. Jouer avec ses amis c'est encore mieux
3. Communauté active
4. Communauté Française + Québec 

Les bas:
1. À jouer en multijoueur
2. En solo IA totalment NUL 
3. Difficile de faire un serveur privé 
4. Beaucoup de kikoo rageux
Muy Ligero (en cuanto a recursos de PC) y muy excelente jugabilidad!! :D 8/10
It's a nice game but sometimes full of hackers, but not that often

Dustforce is truly a work of art. I have no girlfriend and I play this game a lot. I want to fucking kill myself this game is good with zombie mod. 

Los Santos Customs 2014

3/10 would recommend this game
Top, ein sehr fesselndes Spiel das über die Jahre hinweg nicht Out wird.

Melhoria do CS 1.6 o CS Source é o que é!

O melhor!

11 / 10!

This game is a joke, do not buy, not even worth a penny.
Go for CSGO, it's much better.
A classic of FPS (WARNING : Skill needed and not buyable anywhere) that don't need a Computer-Beast to run smoothly

Por alguna rason me dieron BAN permanente en todos los servidores.La cosa es que no se por que y yo no uso hacks por que me parece un juego GENIAL porfavor si alguno de VAVLE STEAM o SOUCER me responde porfavor haga algo

The original, the best, the rage. 10/10
10/10 One of valves greatest games ever made...
With a 1000 hours on this game i can say its pretty fuckin good!

10/10
Херня не покупайте ни когда! Графа мультяшная! Оружие как в Блокаде(ВКОНТАКТЕ)!

Ok.  This is by far my most favorite game ive ever played.  It is just so simple but amazing and you can never be bored with it.  There is alwasys a new fun server you have never heard of or start up in a clan.  The servers range anywhere from simple COD like servers (But accually good) to anywhere from zombie survival, and MLG goof servers its just fantastic there is not much more i can say about this game its just fantastic.  so overall GET THE DAMN GAME!

Jeg er meget til nymordene spil (Staves).
Spillet er meget hyggeligt men graffiken skal lidt højere op for at gøre mig tilfreds.
Vil du have spil som dette vil jeg anbefalde Counter Strike Global Offensive i stedet for.

10/10

I was a god.

Um jogo muito divertido.. Quando voce começa a jogar, vc se vicia aos poucos, e n quer parar de jogar, alem do foco do jogo ser TIRO, tem varios outros modos, outros servers q criam modos diferenter, MINIGAME, SOCCER, JAIL...
Mas o grande problema desse jogo é que TEM UM ANTICHEAT MUITO RUIM, e por isso, tem MUITOS CHEATERS ! Mas é um bom jogo !
not as good as cod ign/420

Старая и добрая игра всей легенды! Игра которая будет жить вечно и идти через поколение в поколение. Спасибо большое движку Source за все! Вы теперь живая легенда среди геймеров!
super spiel mit mehreren schönen spiel modifikationen

Good game overall. Very different from cs1.6 or csgo. Still a lot of people playing this game in public survers. I believe it cost more then csgo so i'd say get csgo instead of source. If you just collect game... buy it.
